foreignData.name: Sturmtief-Leviathan
foreignData.text:
Inseltarnung (Diese Kreatur kann nicht geblockt werden, solange der verteidigende Spieler eine Insel kontrolliert.)
Alle Länder sind zusätzlich zu ihren sonstigen Typen Inseln.
Kreaturen ohne Flugfähigkeit oder Inseltarnung können nicht angreifen.

foreignData.name: Leviatán marea de tormenta
foreignData.text:
Cruza islas. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada mientras el jugador defensor controle una isla.)
Todas las tierras son islas además de sus otros tipos.
Las criaturas que no tienen la habilidad de volar o de cruzar islas no pueden atacar.

foreignData.name: Léviathan de la houle
foreignData.text:
Traversée des îles (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée tant que le joueur défenseur contrôle au moins une île.)
Tous les terrains sont des îles en plus de leurs autres types.
Les créatures sans le vol ou la traversée des îles ne peuvent pas attaquer.

foreignData.name: Leviatano della Burrasca
foreignData.text:
Passa-Isole (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata fintanto che il giocatore in difesa controlla un'Isola.)
Tutte le terre sono Isole in aggiunta ai loro altri tipi.
Le creature senza volare o passa-Isole non possono attaccare.

foreignData.name: 嵐潮のリバイアサン
foreignData.text:
島渡り（このクリーチャーは防御プレイヤーが島をコントロールしているかぎりブロックされない。）
すべての土地は、自身の他のタイプに加えて島でもある。
飛行か島渡りを持たないクリーチャーは攻撃できない。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — リバイアサン

foreignData.name: 폭풍파도 리바이어던
foreignData.text:
섬잠입 (수비플레이어가 섬을 조종하는 한, 이 생물은 방어될 수 없다.)
모든 대지는 자신의 다른 유형에 더불어 섬이다.
비행 또는 섬잠입이 없는 생물은 공격할 수 없다.

foreignData.name: Leviatã da Tormenta Marinha
foreignData.text:
Travessia de ilha (Esta criatura não poderá ser bloqueada enquanto o jogador defensor controlar uma Ilha.)
Todos os terrenos são Ilhas além de seus outros tipos.
Criaturas sem voar ou travessia de ilha não podem atacar.

foreignData.name: Левиафан Штормового Прилива
foreignData.text:
Знание Островов (Это существо не может быть заблокировано, пока защищающийся игрок контролирует Остров.)
Все земли являются Островами в дополнение к своим другим типам.
Существа без Полета или Знания Островов не могут атаковать.

foreignData.name: 暴潮海怪
foreignData.text:
海岛行者（只要防御牌手操控海岛，此生物就不能被阻挡。）
所有地均额外具有海岛此类别。
不具飞行或海岛行者异能的生物不能攻击。

foreignData.name: 暴潮海怪
foreignData.text:
海島行者（只要防禦玩家操控海島，此生物就不能被阻擋。）
所有地均額外具有海島此類別。
不具飛行或海島行者異能的生物不能攻擊。

name: Stormtide Leviathan
originalText:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
All lands are Islands in addition to their other types.
Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack.

rulings.text: Stormtide Leviathan’s second ability causes each land on the battlefield to have the land type Island. Each land thus has the ability “{T}: Add {U}.” Nothing else changes about those lands, including their names, other subtypes, other abilities, and whether they’re legendary or basic.

If Stormtide Leviathan loses its abilities, all lands on the battlefield (including those that enter the battlefield later on) will still be Islands in addition to their other types and will still be able to tap to produce {U}. The way continuous effects work, Stormtide Leviathan’s type-changing ability is applied before the effect that removes that ability is applied.
Stormtide Leviathan’s third ability affects all creatures with neither flying nor islandwalk, regardless of who controls them. They can’t attack any player or planeswalker.
Islandwalk cares about lands with the land type Island, not necessarily lands named Island.

text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
All lands are Islands in addition to their other types.
Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack.
